actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the completion of the Natchez Trace Parkway from Natchez, Mississippi, to Nashville, Tennessee.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to carry out a plan for the completion, within five years, of the Natchez Trace Parkway from Natchez, Mississippi, to Nashville, Tennessee. Authorizes appropriations of up to $180,000,000 to complete such parkway.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the completion of the Natchez Trace Parkway from Natchez, Mississippi, to Nashville, Tennessee.
